The material is thicker than the hanes or fotl and have a much better fit. So my hubby has found a new undershirt. I do Reccommend these for quality, fit, price and prompt shipping

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: These are lightweight very comfortable pocket tshirts. They run small and shrink in wash. So I recommend to buy sizes up. This is my second order. So I highly recommend. Especially anyone in the Texas heat. God bless

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: I gave it a try and now I'm absolutely in love with these.
reviews:
I'm really starting to love this brand originally I got it on a prime deal and now all the sudden I'm buying all of their products from socks to T-shirts to underwear.
They seem to hold up fairly well. They smell clean when you get them, no mechanical are funky chemical smell. When washing these they do not shrink extremely bad like other products do and they're so expensive it practically makes fruit of the loom junk to me.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Medium
reviews: Shirts were in good condition on arrival, shipped nice, and fit great after a wash. For all the reviews I read here, I had no issues. No holes, none of that. And besides, you're paying about $3 a tshirt. lol Even if they were crap, I wouldn't feel too bad. But, I was nicely surprised and ordered a second set of all white.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I will only buy off amazon these are the best quality shirts in my opinion and at this price point i will only buy here seems to me there better quality than in store purchase and they are true to fit I will definitely buy again üôÇüôÇ

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews: As is often the case; the actual size is not what I expected. ie bigger than previous t-shirts. Over all they seem to be well made. Next time I‚Äôll do the test fit in person & exchange if needed.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Not heavyweight, very short sleeves, 15-20% shrinkage in warm water
reviews: If this is heavyweight, then I don't know what that means anymore. Both sleeves and tail are short to begin with, even shorter after first wash. Will probably be okay under a shirt or sweater, unsuitable for wearing alone. Mine were in perfect shape, no loose threads, etc., but I wouldn't buy them again due to the shrinkage and the sleeves were too short before washing. Well, they were inexpensive . . .

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews: I love this brand of t-shirts however they have tarnished their name with this line. I regret ordering these. They are so thin they can't be worn. I will use them for rags. Shame on Gildan for putting these out there. Trust me do not buy these.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: When I first got the 5-pack I fully inspected each shirt. I found none of the flaws some others reported. They were a bit large when I tried them on before washing. Once washed in warm water they shrunk slightly and fit me very well. The fabric is a bit thicker than I expected but they are very nice. I like the colors but wish there had been two red shirts.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I wear these almost every day, for everything. Cleaning out the garage, doing work, waxing the car, working out, you name it haha. They are pretty soft, but they aren't really made for working out so the moisture-wicking isn't as good as a workout shirt, but definitely enough to be a medium quality+ everyday shirt! They fit perfectly and feel great.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Better fit and much darker black over Hanes and other low priced Tshirts. Even hold their weight when compared to some higher end brands. They also do very well when being washed, put in cold and wash only blacks. They will stay dark for quite a long time.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: They seem to be well made but they are not as heavy as the Hanes Beefy-T which is more expensive. If you live in an area with cold winters, I would pay the money and get the heavier t-shirts, i.e., 5 oz. or more. These are fine in a temperate or warm climate.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
review_title: Ordered large... these could probably fit a Buick. Like a whole Buick.
reviews: WAAAAAY too big for a "large" tshirt. Definitely stay away from this. Waste of money.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: After reading the reviews I was hesitant but for the price I ordered anyway. Happy I did great tshirt. It is thick and fit well. It comes a little long but good for tucking and just in case there is shrinking after the first wash. For the price a no brainer.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: After getting some of these I won't go back to Hanes again! The material is a bit thicker, the fit seems better, and I'm pleased with the overall quality. I have a couple shirts that took on a (VERY) light tan tint but I think that may be related to me forgetting to separate lights and darks. Overall though, these t-shirts are continuing to replace others as they (more quickly) wear out.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I'd like to quarrel these T shirts they feel good they look good it looks good how warm all the time I have volume in the past So I want to head and double up They are worth the price I don't think you're wrong with them

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
review_title: Excellent T shirt, much better than Weekender T shirt
reviews:
Excellent t shirts 2nd buy, red color does not bleed on first wash in cold water not like other brands. I highly recommend this product.

I was concern of poor quality. However person wrote that renark was 100% wrong!

The quality and texture is excellent. And the price you pay is much less than Ad at big box store. My wish mfg add more colors to existing line. I would buy more TShirt.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
reviews: Out of the pack of 5, three of them fit super small and the other two fit almost like a dress. Super inconsistent in sizing.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Medium
review_title: Shrink up a LOT after washing!
reviews: These shrinkbup about 2 full sizes when washing! Forget about trying to get the massive wrinkles out as well, no chance! May be ok under other shirts, but no good if you intend to wear it alone!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews: I was buying these shirts 1 by 1 at the local dollar store because they are more durable and comfortable than most. But at 5$ each it kinda sucks in the long run when you can buy 5 at the price of 16$ which is close to 5 for the price of 3 normally. Very convenient.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Older gentleman wears medium. Fits well, true to size. Fabric a bit thin but he doesn‚Äôt like the heavyweight shirt. He would have liked sleeves a little longer. Good summer T or in winter under a sweatshirt

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews:
Shirts came fast and well packed
Quality is good and at good price
It doesn‚Äôt feel cheap at all and it can easily match the expensive brands
After wash shirts still feel good
I do recommend it

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: XX-Large
reviews: Just ordered my second set of shirts. They fit nicely and keep their fit after washing. They also hold their color. Great price for 5 t-shirts and they look like a more expensive T-shirt when worn.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
review_title: Great fit, great value. I reccommend over white in summertime.
reviews: I just love a soft cotton shirt that fits for the first time. Great value. Good color choice. I can't stand white shirts in the summer where you see the sweat stains that never washout and I hate spending ton of money on CK, Hanes, and FoL.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Medium
reviews: I love this for the price. The short sleeve (it is short sleeve and not standard sleeve so it goes slightly below your shoulders) is a decent adequate quality t shirt you can wash ten times and throw away. I wear it on a sunny day with my shorts and jeans.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Love these shirts, However I occasionally get them with what looks like bleach or something that has discolored the shirts in areas. SEE PICTURE. This stuff should be caught during inspection. This is my second order, Just not worth the trouble to return one of 6 shirts, but its annoying.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: The only note on these great shirts is several of them have a long length of thread coming from the inside of the shirt on the armpit. I just tie it off in a knot and cut it so no big deal, but can be a little time-consuming.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Decent quality T-shirts that washes well and retains its color. Soft and comfortable for indoors and outdoors. Shrinks slightly when dried in the dryer. Good value for money. Will buy again.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: A good buy for a good T-shirt.
reviews: My husband loves this brand of t-shirt, but the local store where he got them went out of business. He was very happy to see that Amazon carries them & even more happy to see that they were even less expensive than they had been at the local store!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
review_title: They initially fit but have shrunk in the first two washes.
reviews: These t shirts are comfortable and would make great t shirts but unfortunately have shrunk a little in the first two washes. I normally order and wear large t shirts but it looks like I will have to order XL size the next time to ensure they don't shrink to small.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: These looked HUGE when we received them!! They also seemed a bit see-through. I put them in the washer and then dried them in the dryer and they shrunk dramatically, which I was HOPING for. Since it shrunk so much, it also made the material feel thicker. They are pretty lightweight and not something my son or husband would wear by itself, but they like them for under shirts. Overall, they are happy.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: XX-Large
reviews: I am a plus size woman and I bought the grey and black selection in a men's size 2X. I wanted a loose fitting, soft t-shirt for sleeping. I have very sensitive skin and send back more items than I wear, but these are perfect. Very soft, and no itchy tags to remove. And at a great price!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Does not look like the picture.
reviews: Poor fit. Picture shows a tapered body but these shirts fit like a bag. Sleeves do not fit well either.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: These are perfect and for the price it‚Äôs a big win they are comfortable and soft. I‚Äôm short I‚Äôm 5‚Äù3 so they go below the waist for me but my brother is 5‚Äù9 and they fit him nice as well u can use these as a under shirt or even if your going out some where nice. If your like me a nice iron to them will make them look even more crispy. I‚Äôm definitely buying a couple more packs

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews: Absolute great quality product. The fabric is pretty thick not thin like my previous white shirts from different brands. Exactly what I was looking for. Shirts still great fitting after multiple washes so far. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for plain white shirts. Give it a try.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
reviews: There junk scratchy to short to wide there not good for much. Finding holes in shirts washed once.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I got these shirts for my dad and bf. They both love them and wear them daily. They‚Äôre great and it too heavy and not too light. We live in a tropical climate and it keeps them cool and breezy.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: We should have ordered a size smaller hoping they shrink
reviews: Got these for my teenager who wears a 2xl at Old Navy, Aeropostale, American Eagle and other brand name clothing stores. But the 2xl in these tshirts are much larger than we are used to in brand name clothing. We are going to wash them in hot water and dry them to get them to shrink up a bit. Other than that they are great, good quality and excellent pricing. And we would always prefer a bit too big than to small.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I used these with my vinyl cutting machine. They work great with my heatpress. Cricut / Silhouette users will not be disappointed! The shoulders are big though so they definitely fit male frames better.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
review_title: Comfortable t-shirts with good fit, durability to be determined
reviews: These shirts fit me well and feel comfortable. I did expect there would be more than two black shirts in the package, but they all look good, so not a big deal. I would have given 5 stars but I don't yet know the durability.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I have to admit these are an excellent deal. Usually when you're getting T-shirts that are at this price point you're looking at all sorts of possible fitting and quality control issues. These shirts are of excellent quality and fit as you'd want them to...and the fitting chart was spot on for me. Very happy my order (12x white) and will order again!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews: These shirts are inexpensive but still look good and feel nice to wear. They didn't shrink after being laundered and didn't loose anything in their looks or feel. I don't think you'll be disappointed if you keep in mind they don't cost ten dollars a piece.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Navy/Heather Navy/Indigo Blue (5-pack)Size: X-Large
review_title: Lg to small- xl too big
reviews: I wear a large shirt normally but bought both large and extra large . Large was way to tight in the arms and around gut and length was too short , the extra large was way to big , baggy around the arms and length went to my knees. If I would have washed the large them my 11 year old could have worn it and the extra large would have never shrunk up enough for me to wear . I will say the material was good , it was was soft and durable

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews: I tried these on arrival and fit well. After one wash and dry they had shrunk to the point I couldn't wear them.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Shrunk a lot in the wash
reviews: These seem to be decent quality, and they're very soft, which is good. Unfortuately, they shrink nearly half a size in the washer. So buy a size larger than you normally wear, or only ever wash these in cold water and never put in the dryer.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I am pretty particular about T-shirts because I wear a white one every day under a shirt or sweater. These shirts are comfortable, durable, and priced reasonably. I have tried all brands of undershirts and like these the best. They might run a little large for people, but I want them to fit a little loosely.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
reviews: Low price for great shirts. Fit was just right. Cotton is medium weight. Personally not too crazy about the light gray shirts and I'm not sure I'd wear them much, but the black and dark gray look great. Not too heavy for a workout. Gildan is one of the big players on T-shirts. You'll find them behind many logo and graphic design shirts. Will definitely buy again.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Not worth the money. IMO they‚Äôre the same quality as Hanes, Fruit of the loom, etc. Thinner shirt with cheap/thin neck. For some reason I‚Äôve bought shirt with logos on them before that were Gildan and they were great....these however are cheaply made.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Poor quality and shrinks a lot
reviews: I really dislike how much these shrink after one wash. I have bought many different kind of undershirts before and have never seen this sort of shrinkage before. They are very uncomfortable at the armpits and rise to almost above waistline after it. Overall, seems like meh quality and the shrinking makes them almost unwearable.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I will never buy another brand of plain shirts. These are a sturdy, thick yet light tee shirt that feel supportive, strong, and are extremely comfortable. Many times thick shirts feel bulky and stiff. These do not. They are very soft and I am currently working on replacing all my tee shirts with Gildan.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: 3 x needs a 4 x in these t 's
reviews: I could tell after I washed the t shirt they would shrink up. Fit a little to snug . I'm a 3x but like a little more room in my t shirt.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Shirt quality is horrible. Fits very loose like i just got out of a shirt pulling party. If your looking for a fitted shirt these aren't it. Plus they strink tremendously after a couple washes

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: As expected, these Gildan white tee shirts fit well and seem to be holding up well after several washings. I have used this brand before and have not been disappointed. Also they are a good value.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Navy/Heather Navy/Indigo Blue (5-pack)Size: Medium
review_title: Nice shirts but not all 5 are moisture wicking.
reviews: Two of the tee shirts are moisture wicking. The other three are 100 percent cotton. They are nice shirts just not all the same. Maybe mine was a honest mistake. I don't know. My son likes them all.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: These shirts are a good bargain! Love getting these as undershirts! For the bad the white ones aren't super white they are a dingy white. Others like the grey shirts are perfect!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I really like Gildan T-shirts. They hold up well and are not overly thin. I am a woman and I like the large- size shirts to wear with my jeans. But when these arrived, they were more like an extra-large size. I will probably just wear these shirts around the house with leggings. I feel that it is hard to beat this quality and price.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: My son is 13 yrs old, average build.Great fit
reviews: My picky son is 13 years old. He is average build. These shirts looked huge by eye, but they wound up fitting perfectly. He loves them .

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
Shirts are good. Down rated because I wish they would have included another color than BRIGHT red, like maybe maroon?

I aways wash RED COLOR items separate from other wash, red color bleeding into other clothes is never good.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Probably my fault, but I've gotten Gilden T-shirts that I thought were the best I've had. These were extremely thin, fit right, but very short in length and sleeves. They also come out of the dryer with more wrinkles then any other T shirts I've bought. Think 50's T-shirts.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
reviews:
Wasn‚Äôt sure how these would work out, but these shirts are a better quality than hanes or fruit of the loom. I‚Äôm 6‚Äô2‚Äù and most shirts only go down as low as the top of where my jeans sit, but not these (size Large)! They actually hang down about 3 inches below my belt, are twice as thick as ‚ÄúH‚Äù and ‚ÄúF of the L‚Äù, and also twice as soft.
Gonna get more of these for my bug out bag. These seem like a durable/universal enough shirt for the end of the world

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews: The shirts are very nice, but damm Amazon listings. I typed in POCKET TEES, and thought these looked good, unfortunately they are not pocket tees. My fault for thinking I was specific in my desires, fooled me. The shirts are really great but Amazon cannot be trusted to show what you ask for.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: I have come to like this brand for men's t-shirts and underwear.
reviews: I like this brand very much. I've never purchased it before. However when I bought t-shirts and boxer brief underwear for my husband, they fit him just right. The t-shirts didn't have too much shrinkage after washing and drying. But like with any other cotton product you should probably remember to fold them or hang them up whatever you prefer right after they dry cuz they do wrinkle easily. Which is fine it's an undershirt after all.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: This was my second order of these shirts. Loved the first order, 2nd one not so much. First shirt in the pack looked like a dirty fingerprint on it. Another shirt had the blue ink that they use to stamp Gildan on all over the back of a shirt. Probably not the norm, but someone was rushing and not doing a good job with quality!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Ordered "2 sizes larger" to allow for washing and machine drying, and glad I did, as "regular" size would have shrunk too much. I use them for painting, and the 10-pack was an excellent price for work tees that become ruined in a short time by paint splatter, but make excellent paint rags after several washings. Very lightweight and comfortable for warm interior work.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: This T-shirt is good for men and women. It is a high quality shirt with great great stitching in all the important areas like hem, underarm, neckband. No tag yay and keep you cool. I love my T-shirts and recommend them for everyone.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
As always, Amazon delivered on time. For the price, nothing beats it. Product fit nicely, although a bit thin, expected as it is not too expensive.
Gildan undershirts are good. For a little bit higher price, I want a product that is more of quality.
Will still buy Gildan, though.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews: I bought those ones in XL and they were too big. Not that much not to wear them but still bigger than XL's are usually. After the first ones they shrunk a lot (photo) and now they fit perfectly. So be aware they might shrink a lot.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
review_title: Holes in shirts in less than 3 months
reviews: Holes in anywhere there is a stitch. Product developed holes within the second washing. First appeared in the armpit area and ‚Äúmigrated‚Äù to any area there was a stitch. Garbage product.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: The material is very thin, not good quality. I‚Äôve owned Gildan t-shirts in the past and the fabric was better quality, thicker.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I ordered a medium size 6 pack of t-shirts. When I received them they were WAY too big and long. It fit like an extra large. They're baggy, not fitting or fitted.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: The six shirts are well worth the money, but I assure you, they started to shrink from the get go. I ordered a large , even though I am a 40" inch chest. Expect soft but thin material and very comfortable....

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
The black shirts that I purchased fit really well. They have a longer length, which is great when you have to bend down. No one needs to see a full moon, a half moon, or even a crack of the moon.

I'm sure the white shirts would fit just as well.

* Update: The white shirts, that I also purchased, fit perfectly with the same length as the black shirts.

Stay safe! ‚úå

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I got these shirts in several sizes to put on iron-on designs for a fundraising run. They were very suitable. The iron-on for dark fabrics went on without a hitch. I ran into trouble with a kid's shirt (not this brand) that had polyester in it, and the decal got too hot and turned brown. With these 100% cotton ones I had no problem whatsoever.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Quality and size is pretty much as I expected.
reviews: I could have used another 1/2 inch around the chest. The provided size measurements must assume gentle pressure on the chest. On me the bottom is about 4-5 inches below my belt line. Perfect length for me.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: These shirts shrink up faster than George Costanza in a pool. The length right out of the bag was below the belt but after one wash they shrink right up and now I can barely tuck it in. Unfortunately this causes my dress shirt to look bunched up at the bottom when the white undershirt works it‚Äôs way up. I‚Äôm 6‚Äô2‚Äô and 195 and bought the large but maybe I should have gone with the extra large. I‚Äôll probably just look else where for a slim fit tall shirt.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews: These were terrible, cheap looking and come out of the dryer looking like you have slept in them fo days. Spend the extra money on a better product

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
reviews: DO NOT BUY THESE SHIRTS. They've shrunk from a cozy large to a skin tight, young men's medium after no more than 4 or 5 times through the wash. product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews: The fit is as expected and bought them for my 14-year-old 200 pound 6‚Äô1‚Äù son, and they fit great. Not too narrow not too big. Good length for someone who is 6‚Äô1‚Äù and the colors are nice we like them. Good purchase

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews: Love the way they feel. I bought these for my man so he could have some more work shirts. I really love the red on him! I am happy that the shirts did not shrink. I was nervous about the material shrinking in the wash.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: The ink on the printed label runs
reviews: Unfortunately, we didn't open the packages of these tee shirts right away. When I did, I washed them in cold water but... the blue inside label ran. Terrible looking tees after one wash and too late to return.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews:
Gildan tee shirts actually feel soft, and the colors stay fast. BUT, these shirts shrink for at least 2-3 washings.

If I order them again, I will order the next size up, as the ones I have are becoming glorified waxing rags for my car.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Black/Sport Grey/Military Green (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews: These shrink so badly. Horrible purchase.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: These shirts are very comfortable. I really like the colors too. I hope they age well. They do shrink some. I tried one on before I washed it and I thought I got a size to big. After I washed it fit very nicely. I wish I could get more of the red shirts.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
review_title: These are great shirts but they do shrink a tad. I take an extra large so the 2nd batch I ordered XX
reviews: The only thing I wish is that these were pocket T shirts . And they do shrink just a tiny bit so if you're normally on the border between say a large and an extra large ....get the extra large

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: For $10 for a 6-pack, I half expected these t-shirts to be too short, too small and stitched together badly. None of that is the case. They're decently long and actually too big in the midsection to fit me well as an undershirt. As usual, I'd prefer a slightly looser neckband. If you're delicate, be aware that the material is not nearly as smooth as t-shirts that cost 3X the price. Overall, good for the price. I'll probably buy a pack of size L to wear under dress shirts.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Super Soft and Lightweight, Especially for Gildans
reviews: These are ultra-soft and pretty lightweight!!! I was expecting to receive the usual Gildan mid/heavyweight t-shirts that I normally buy, but these were a pleasant surprise!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: This pack is good for someone who needs these types of shirts for under other work clothing but it sould be nice to have a multi pack of other colors as well. Either black or white doesnt really cut it.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Ordered these t shirts several times and they never disappoint

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: What a waste of money. I'm a 5'11" and 300lbs guy. So when it comes to t-shirts I like them one size bigger then my actual size. These shirts for being XXL they felt like a large instead.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Runs small order the next size up from your normal size
reviews: These seem like decent shirts, but after washing and drying them, I looked like I shopped at Baby Gap when I put them on, buy a size larger than you normally wear. They will make excellent shop rags though.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Ordered size small for my son who is 14 and about 5‚Äô6-7‚Äù and 100lbs. He tried them on before washing and they were a great size with even room to grow. He washed and dried them and they shrunk in length BIG time. So if you buy these either size up or wash in cold and air dry. Disappointed in how much they shrunk.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
reviews: The t-shirts fit perfectly and had the feel I expected them to have, especially after the first washing. They're sturdy and retain their shape and color after washing. The tagless feature is awesome, although that's pretty standard now across most brands. And the price was extremely good compared to other brands. I'll be buying these again for sure.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Simple but good for the price
reviews: For the price is not bad. I'm 5'8", 160 lbs, so this is XXL. Nice length, because sometimes with the beer belly, most t-shirts end up short, showing belly at the bottom.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I am satisfied with most everything I have with the Gildan brand. The cotton in these tees is soft and although I haven't washed them yet, I expect that they hold their size well as other Gildan products do. Remember, cotton will shrink some like it does in all products. The fit is perfect and to size.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews: These shirts fit out of the box, but immediately shrunk when washed with similar shirts. Shirts went from an XL tall to a regular large. It's hard to find shirts long enough for my torso, so it's frustrating to see these shrink right away.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: It‚Äôs hard buying clothes online sometimes because half the time you end up getting something that‚Äôs not the right fit either to thin, to long or short, or not quite what the picture looks like but these were just right for me.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Pilled after two washes. Will not buy again.
reviews: Not wearable after two washes. It pilled everywhere. Unfortunate, because the fit was perfect for my 11 year old, the colors were good and the material was soft. Now lives at the bottom of my son‚Äôs dresser, next stop - garage rag.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Felt the need to replace some well-worn t-shirts. These seem to fit my needs. Time will tell as to durability, shrinkage, and all of that. For now, I'm happy.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
reviews: I've bought shirts that were from Fruit of the Loom and Hanes and compared to these two brands these Gildan t-shirts feel thicker, they're soft and they have a higher quality feel to them, similar to higher thread count sheets.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: My son only wears white t-shirts under his work shirt. These last the longest.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I hate buying packs of white t-shirts cause they fit once and then shrink after you wash them and and you can tell they are under shirts. These are great! Don't shrink, fit perfect and not super thin material. Buy these!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews: I ordered this pack of shirts for my boyfriend as a Christmas present. He loved the quality and the basic colors but the shirts ended up being a little smaller than expected so I had to return and order a larger size. I would recommend ordering a size larger than normal but other than that they are wonderful quality and are amazing everyday basic options.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: These are lightweight for sure. Very comfortable and nice, but they are a thin T-shirt material. If you were looking for something thick and heavy weight this is not it. If you were looking for something light weight, airy and comfortable and this is it.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Good price - the material seems a little rough
reviews: It would have been nice to have a brighter color selection. For the price, this is a good deal. The t-shirts feel a little rougher than the Hanes I usually get and the neckline is a little different, but okay.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: XX-Large
reviews: I was pleased with the fit and comfort of these t-shirts. Not overly thick, but not tissue paper thin either. Very good feel and the neck stays like it should.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews: I liked everything about these shirts except the part where 3 out of 5 got a big hole in the pit after only being worn twice.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
I am 5'9" and average build. They fit pretty well and feel comfortable. Unfortunately, they shrunk a little(of course this could be my doing).

For the price I would prolly get these again.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Perfect fit my husband loves this brand
reviews: My husband loves this brand

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
The fit is perfect, but the quality is not what I expected for a product with such good reviews. The fabric is thin, the collar gets bent easily.

I don't know how durable they are, but I will be surprised if they last more than a season.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
review_title: Best blank shirts for the price
reviews: These T-shirts feel great. Thin and true to size. Quite soft, and definitely comfortable. If you want a thin comfortable cloth that‚Äôs a normal fit and breathable, this is the shirt pack for you.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I cook in a restaurant and absolutely love these black shirts , what‚Äôs best is when it‚Äôs hot they hide the pit stains so no one can see how much you sweat behind the line ‚Ä¶

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: bought these for use in the work shop. Used to be in the clothig business silk screen and embroidery.These shirts all well made and seem to b holding up after numerous washings. Not a fashion statement just solid comfortable value.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Material is not at all soft.
reviews: The description promised a fabric that would feel soft. It couldn‚Äôt be further from the truth. I‚Äôve opened the packet, tried one on and will never put it on again. Proportions not as expected, material fairly course for a cotton material and all round too big for an under layer.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Runs small and the material was, not just thin, but VERY thin. One wash and it'll be a size small. I returned it and bought another brand.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: This shirt is amazing, I mean just beyond belief. A T-shirt of epic quality. Does it look like every other T-shirt? Yes, but really isn't that what you want? Safe, plain, stains easley hidden in the blackness. This is your shirt.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
reviews:
For less than three dollars per shirt it might even be cost effective to use them as spill mops. The quality and colors are much better than I expected. Great for wearing under my quarter zips for an extra layer. The poor reviews on these shirts begs the question; What do you want for nothing?
I will re-post if they dissolve after washing.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Medium
reviews: I wear the tshirt first day and it's unstitched everywhere. The black one is the worst. There are 5-6 threads flying around. Never expected such poor quality from Gildan. I hope the other ones in the pack would be better.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: The material doesn't feel like 100% cotton as stated. Bought some a few weeks back so I ordered another set. Now I am going to throw these away. Waste of money. Don't have time to keep doing the return crap.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: This is not an undershirt as they are WAY too short. I am only 5‚Äô8‚Äù and these don‚Äôt stay tucked at all. The arm holes fit better than Jerzees and Fruit of the Loom. These are nowhere near as soft as the Hanes, but are cheaper and thicker which is good for colder weather. I‚Äôm considering cutting one up to sew pieces on the bottoms of others to make them longer and stay tucked.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: With less than 6 months of regular wear, I've had to throw out 2 of the 6 purchased because of holes. I won't purchase this brand again, and will be skeptical of the "Amazon's Choice" indicator.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I have always used HAN_S t-shirts for as long as I can remember. But their stitching, color fade and overall quality have taken a turn for the worse. So I decided to give these a try. After 6 months on regular use, I will not be going back unless they keep raising their prices.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: im a short slender dude that likes a baggier fit especially around the chest and these are perfect for work! not too thin or too thick and hold up well in the wash. I havnt experienced any bad wrinkling or shrinkage and no holes/tears/stains or anything so far! would reccomend especially if you need stuff for a uniform that youre moving around a lot in. (I work at a grocery store for refrence)

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Good basic tees that don‚Äôt shrink
reviews: These are a good choice if looking for some basic tees. These are long enough and didn‚Äôt shrink in the was, which is a PLUS. Thick and not see through on the lighter colors.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
Very durable and well made. Soft and comfortable! The price was right so I bought 4 packs of 6. I won't be running out of white
t-shirts anytime soon. I'd like to add the fact that they are tagless so there are no annoying tags rubbing the back of your neck. I've had Hanes, Fruit of The Loom and BVD, and they're all good. Gildan is just as good, if not better than the other brands I mentioned.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I bought these shirts specifically because they were described as tag-free. Not only are they NOT tag-free - every shirt has 2 irritating tags!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: For a T shirt, it is nice enough to wear out in public. Perfect for those steamy summer days, and great shirt for winter. They are a little long, just the way I like them, to cover that extended belly syndrome!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Black/Sport Grey/Military Green (5-pack)Size: Large
review_title: What you get is not what you expect.
reviews: Description clearly states Gildan and not all of the shirts were Gildan. The shirts were just stuffed into a mailing envelope. I am returning them because not what the description says and I have to pay shipping. Not Happy At All with this purchase. Giving it only a one star and that is only because the order showed up.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Nice quality shirts. So soft. They don‚Äôt shrink in the dryer. Great deal. They are pretty long. I am 5‚Äô10‚Äù and the XL hits me almost mid thigh. I use them as sleep shirts since they were a bit long for hubby.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I ordered this 5-pack, hoping they were what I needed. They were not. No problem with the quality of the shirts, they are just too small and do not come in the "next size". I'm way impressed with Amazon's return policy. They emailed me a label, I printed it and stuck in on the pkg (along with an accompanying statement that goes inside the pkg) and dropped it off at a UPS Store nearby. I was credited the amount after they received the pkg and examined the contents.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: these shirts shrink a solid half size
reviews: i like the price of these shirts however i would mention they shrink about a half size. medium doesnt shrink to a small but it shrinks smaller than id like. large shrinks larger than a medium but still not what id like. i love the fit of the medium pre wash but not so much after wash cold/cold low heat dry

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews:
Good quality non-white undershirt for price hard to beat Im 6'3 and wear a large shirt, but wear XL of these. Fits like a large once washed. Don't draw up like the white t gilden sells.
Length is perfect to tuck or not.
Thin is ok for an undershirt.
For under polyester work uniform that feels like its sanding your nipples off, these are A1.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: XX-Large
reviews: These shirts are true to size and very comfortable. They are soft and well made. Great for wearing alone or layered.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: The shirts are fine, and when I took them out of the bag, husband was happy to see they were longer than his other shirts. They might actually stay tucked! But, alas, they shrank after the first wash and dry on cool/medium settings. Have to reorder in a bigger size just to accommodate the shrinkage.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews: Great shirts I can't an can't complain about them. Fresh out the pack there perfect. Looks great fits great but after one wash warm water or cold water it looks like a shirt already in your sock or shirt drawer. Again perfect shirt as a one time wear out but after you wash it it still fits perfectly but as for looking like a one wash tee shirt.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
I find Gilden products last longer than many of the other garments I have used in my past. In my experience Gilden
clothing don‚Äôt fade from laundering, elastic doesn‚Äôt stretch out or fall apart and they remain comfortable and look nice longer than the older names one may think of.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
As expected these will shrink but were a little large so the fit worked well after a wash.
No issues as far as build quality, the cotton is not heavy but that could be a plus in warmer seasons.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: They are thinner (lighter) than previously made.
reviews:
I buy these shirts for work and I used to order Gildan shirts for my businesses shirts (which had graphics and logo printed on them); these are noticeably thinner, lighter in weight than any I‚Äôve purchased before.
Their length is correct, their width is too. They fit great and though thinner is better during the summer I‚Äôm concerned about how they‚Äôll survive a few washes. We shall see.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Good quality. I washed them several times and the color holds up, although I can't claim much for this type of inexpensive t-shirt. The material is good, although I have liked others I have bought in the past, from other brands.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Like all t-shirts, the first time or two you wear them they feel and fit nice. After they get washed a few times its like they shrink. Typically before I wear one now I stand on one end and pull up on the other end, then turn it sideways and repeat.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Got them in ans got excited. However coming back from work and taking the button off, there's now three holes. The button spot, and a wider one next to it. So material likely can't handle buttons or pins. So, great offer, but don't expect the shirts to last long if you want to accessorize or may need to for work.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
I am 5‚Äô10‚Äù/ 190lbs, purchased the xlg. I have broad shoulders and 34‚Äù waist. These shirts fit me really well but are of a very thin cotton material. I prefer my under shirts to be thin actually. They are 100% cotton, so they shrink considerably, so order accordingly.
I have read some of the negative reviews regarding what I just stated, but do not consider these things to be negative. These shirt are about $2 each, and are a great value.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: My husband loves these shirts. He wears them to work. He's a machinist and doesn't need anything real expensive because they tend to get a bit oily. But he likes a thicker shirt because of that too. These fit the bill.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Medium
reviews: Fits wells good material a little worse for wear in that I work in a more heavy duty environment and the everyday riff raff has torn a small hole in the abdomen area like my other shirts, which is why I ordered these, in much less time. These would be good shirts for everyday wear as opposed to heavier environments like sports and work. They're cheap, fit well and are made of a nice material. I'd buy them again for sure.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Nice looking tee shirt, neck stays flat & tight.
reviews: I like Gildan tee shirts. They are well made and fit just right. These shirts did shrink a little, washed on warm/moderate dryer heat. This was a surprise as I have owned others that didn‚Äôt shrink at all. Overall they are a great buy for the money!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Black/Sport Grey/Military Green (5-pack)Size: Large
reviews: The neck on these shrinks and bunches up the body fabric.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Just A Comfortable Cotton Tee You Don't Have To Think Too Much About...
reviews: I've been a loyal Hanes customer for years, and by chance I browsed Amazon and came across these - I bought 2 packs because the price was right and I was curious after reading many positive reviews. I am very happy I did - they are really great. The collar doesn't sag; it looks and feels like a cotton tee should - durable and just plain comfortable. No BS. You can just look in the mirror and say to yourself, "yeah".

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Shrinks three sizes when you wash
reviews: These shirts start out at 2x then when you wash them they fit like a women‚Äôs medium terrible shirts

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: XX-Large
reviews: First let me state that you need to be careful with the heat as these will shrink up! Other than that, I love these shirts. Simple, cheap and great for work or just a simple day of errands. They fit perfect, feel good, and hold up to abuse!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Quality and Comfort at a Reasonable Price
reviews: I ordered the five-pack and while I've only worn one crew neck shirt once, it was soft, comfortable, fit well, and didn't bunch over the course of the day. As of now I'm very satisfied.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Poor quality of material and workmanship
reviews: Seams ripping apart under the arms. I am a field service engineer and my work is not hard on clothing, as it would be for a carpenter or construction worker. These shirts can't handle just regular wear and laundry.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: They shrink so bad you can`t wear after one wash.
reviews: I ordered 2 XL and after one wash they wear to small to wear. You need a 3 XL that will become a 2 XL after a single wash.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
You just can't beat the quality and the bang for your buck. You cannot buy that many t-shirts for this price in stores especially places like Walmart which usually drive a hard bargain. I don't even think they carry Gildan shirts. I plan on ordering again just because I wear the shirts often. If you're a t-shirt person like I am this is a great deal soft comfortable durable. and
definitely for the right price.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: A little long in length but otherwise very nice
reviews: I bought two 6 packs for $9.99 each. They are a little bit long and will hang below your outside shirt. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7‚Äù and have a belly so I bought XL and they fit me well. Not as tight as the Fruit of the Loom XL that I usually buy. I‚Äôll wait until they go down in price again and buy more.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: These shirts are nice and fit my husband true to size. They are 2xl. We washed and dried them before he wore them the first time and they came out of the dryer nice and soft with no apparent shrinkage. We would definitely order again.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I bought a dozen of these t-shirts for my son to wear to his job doing construction work. He gets really dirty! They wash up good and stay soft, yet if any get trashed at work they're cheap enough to toss out!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
review_title: Good but not what I expected.
reviews: Shirts are fine and fit well. What disappointed me was that these are made lighter than the previous Golden‚Äôs I bought a year or two ago. Maybe it‚Äôs considered progress but I expected thicker material. That‚Äôs why I bought these again. Will try another brand next time.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Navy/Heather Navy/Indigo Blue (5-pack)Size: Medium
review_title: Not bad looking, but shrank too much
reviews: These T-shirts looked fine and fit well when first unpacked, but after the initial wash they shrank to the point where they would no longer fit comfortably. I had to return them.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Good shirt but comes out of the dryer pretty wrinkled and it shrunk in length after the first wash was below the belt line not it is right at the beltline.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
I just needed a few extra shirts that I could do anything in. Work out, get a little dirty, just casual wear. These shirts were perfect. They are light, so it's easy to stay cool in sunny/hot weather.

They are definitely long shirts, so they could be good for work if you tuck your t-shirts in. Definitely, no butt crack popping out. I have yet to wash or dry them, so I'm not sure how much they shrink.

Overall, worth it for the cost, if you need a plain shirt for any occasion.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Feels great and fits perfectly.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
reviews: Great quality and price! Never have been disappointed with Gildan! The brand makes absolutely fabulous clothing that last and last through many many washes. It‚Äôs the only brand I trust for all my boys and men in our large family.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Soft, great fit, and great buy!!
reviews: After buying white shirts for my husband for 35 years, this one is the winner! The price caused me to question the quality, but I was pleasantly surprised! They wash and wear so well and he says they are very comfortable. Also true to size!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I have bought mine at the end of 2021 and I love them. Quality is fantastic for their price. Fits almost as expected - they do shrink a little after washing that is completely expected. Definitely going to buy them again.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: Large
review_title: Everything I needed from an undershirt
reviews: These were everything I needed out of a pack of under shirts. They're soft, fit is right, not too big not too tight, the fabric doesn't feel cheap and thin (unlike my white fruit of the loom shirts that unfortunately tend to stretch out and droop when I wear them) but it isn't thick and stiff like the pro weight brand, it is right in the middle on how you want a lightweight t shirt to feel. These actually feel sturdy enough to wear as a regular outer t shirt.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: brought these for my husband to work in for the summer. first wash and they started to shrink. The color was great but they will shrink on you so order a size or 2 up if you want to get a seasons wear out of them.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I ordered a large size. When it came I thought it awfully long. But, it shrank up after washing. It fits my husband perfectly. Also, the neckline is not up to the neck but at the collar bone. Thickness is also good for the cooler temperatures. Can't beat the price and quality.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews:
I was unimpressed, even a bit disappointed.
The Ts are lightweight and thin. The neck seemed to stretch out as the day went on. While I didn't return them I will not be buying more. I thought from the positive reviews they would be of better quality than the F of the L type T-shirt. They aren't any better but about the same and that isn't good enough.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Shrank into belly shirts the first time they got washed, glad I have a teenager that was able to use them. I followed the tag for washing but sadly these shrank at least two sizes if not more. Buyer beware.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews:
These are great! Perfect for under a dress shirt and the neck is well made. I was buying a different undershirt for my husband that is a designer brand.
These are superior to them!!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Looks like the picture. Quality is good and fits perfectly. Totally expected this out of Gildan clothes. Have been using Gildan for a long time now and I trust their quality. Never had a complaint about their quality. The only down part about this is the shirt is a little thinner and hence doesn‚Äôt retain a lot of heat. But this would be a great Tshirt for summer use rather than winter

review_title: Tight around neck .. Very  long fit ok if tucked in.
reviews: A little tight around the neck for a xl size. Other than that they seem ok. Ive only worn 2 out of 6 so i have not washed them all yet to see how they shrink.... They are ling enough for Me to tuck in where they stay tucked in.. So lol tight around neck and extra long on body..Thank You.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Shirts gave me a rash. Not 100% cotton. Threw them all in the rag pile. Can't wear them. Must be some kind of blend. The material lable is a lie. That's what I get for buying the cheapest shirts on Amazon..

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I loved the added length of these T-shirts, But then I wash them, and they shrank 3 inches. Do not buy.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I think these were labeled made in Viet Nam. I would put these in thickness as something between a undershirt an a T-shirt. Really impressed with the quality of the cotton for softness. I had these silk screened, they came out nice, and the wash without any shrinkage so far.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I bought t shirts from 2 different companies, these were my least favorite, they are a bit tighter than the other brand and though they were pocket shirts and had no pockets. Make sure when ordering. Not happy

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I would have returned these but needed to use them. The material isn't like any Gildan T-shirt I've had in the past, which was always substantial and long lasting. These are much thinner and flimsy material. Already getting holes and stretching out after a few washes.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: The quality is not what it was
reviews: I have never batted an eye at paying a higher price for the quality of Gilden T-Shirts, but it seems that quality is no longer what I had appreciated. My latest package of Gilden 2x T-Shirts were thin, tight and not as comfortable. This product is now mediocre at best.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
review_title: Nice t-shirts, run a bit on the big size
reviews: I'm 6'4" and 250, and these shirts are still a little big. Definitely long enough, but they remind me more of a 2XLT. I'm definitely not complaining though as I'm sure they're shrink a little bit after I wash them.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: They are OK for cheap T-shirts. It‚Äôs just a plain ordinary white T-shirt. They‚Äôre not as good as the JCPenney thick T-shirts. But they get the job done. Probably won‚Äôt buy them again just because I prefer JCPenney over these

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I ordered as part of a Halloween costume however love the way they fit and feel and wear them every day now. I am very happy with this purchase and will be ordering more. Feels good even after a few washes. Great for use as an undershirt or stylish on its own.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted Black (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews: I love Gildan t-shirts. They fit perfect and are very comfortable. When I received my shirts, I opened the package with my hands no scissors and took one bundled t-shirt and took the piece of tape off. When I unraveled it I noticed a hole on the left bottom side of the t-shirt. It was very disappointing. Guess I will just have to use it for yard work now.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Purchased to replace some old shirts. Quality appears nice. First laundering did not change the size to much or cause much fading. Going to buy another pack to place in the camper for vacation use.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Sometimes you get what you pay for. I suggest you stick with a better brand. Pay a little more but get a much better item. I am 120 lbs, the x large just fit after washing. Now use as clean up rags.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: Good quality

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Assorted ColorsSize: Large
reviews: Tried these even after reading some negative reviews. Bought the 5 pack. I wear a medium but bought Large and they fit perfectly. Very comfortable and 100% cotton. Will buy again.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I washed one time with cold water, Tide, and normal wash. Dried on extra low heat (I dry everything on extra low). I ordered like 10 of them and they all shrunk horizontally so bad (probably 4-5 inches) that they would not stay tucked and I was uncomfortable in them. I had to return them. Weird thing was they didn't shrink vertically. They just lost too much heighth so it's not like buying two sizes too big and letting them shrink would even be feasible.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: My husband likes only 100% cotton t-shirts. They're hard to find. He's not a big dude. Up until we found Gildan, the problem we had was either the shirts were way too long or they shrunk when we washed them and they became uncomfortable. These fit him perfectly and they don't shrink! He likes them a lot and we're going to keep buying this brand.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I got these for my son when plays basketball as his jersey is a bit loose. The shirts fit perfectly. For reference my son is 5‚Äô3‚Äù and 130lbs.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
attr: Number of Items: 5Color: Navy/Heather Navy/Indigo Blue (5-pack)Size: X-Large
reviews: So soft. No tags on the back. Cooling. I bought a XL for my son. He is 5'9 and 210 lbs. Fit is a lil loose but that's the way he likes his shirts.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I'm a real reviewer, not a paid one. These shirts are a great deal for the price of 5@16.95! They use a thin fabric that is very cool and comfortable. They are as well made as $20 t shirts. A great deal!

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: These undershirts are a staple in my home. They wash well, and fit great. The material is soft but does not run or pill. A nice quality product for the money.

product_name: Gildan Men's Crew T-Shirts, Multipack
reviews: I purchased these for my husband as undershirts. He wears these under his polos and they fit great! The price is a affordable and matches the quality. I have washed and dried these many times with very little shrinking (I only hang dry these - no dryer!). My husband is 5"9 and 170 pounds. I ordered a Large and these fit well! Highly recommend!

He, as you could guess, struggles finding shirts that are long enough without looking baggy but these fit perfect. They did shrink a little in the dryer but a little tug and they‚Äôre right back to normal. Air drying them is fine too. Soft material and good quality! Will definitely buy again!

reviews: After just one wash, and not using high temps, these shirts shrunk a few sizes. I would‚Äôve never thought possible to see the amount of shrinkage.
